    ElasticSearch.elasticGetUser
    Retieves the user frmo elastic search using the username (at login and when viewing another user's item)
    IncomingBids
    Created by erin on 13/03/16.
    IncomingBidsActivity
    Created by andrew on 14/03/16.
    Item
    Created by Martina on 16-02-29.
    ItemController
    Created by Adam on 16-03-11.
    ItemList
    Created by Martina on 16-02-29.
    MyBidsActivity
    This class shows the user a list of their items that they have bid on and whether the bid has been accepted, rejected or is still pending.
    MyBorrowedItemActivity
    This displays a single item that the user is borrowing and allows them to view the information on it.
    MyBorrowedItemsActivity
    This activity, much like MyItemsActivity, lists the items that the user is currently borrowing.
    MyItemActivity
    This activity shows ONE of the current user's available items.
    MyItems
    Created by erin on 13/03/16.
    MyItemsActivity
    It's very possible that activity may have to be deleted to deal with the fragments
    MyProfileViewActivity
    This activity lists for the user their profile information which can then be edited (using longClick) as well as the options to view their items (MyItemsActivity), view items of theirs with bids on them (MyBidsActivity) and search for things to borrow (SearchResultsActivity).
    NewListingActivity
    This activity allows the user to enter all the necessary information about a piece of equipment and save it to their repository of equipment.
    ProfileDialog
    Created by andrew on 12/03/16.

    R.styleable  
    SearchResultsActivity
    This activity displays to the user all the items that match their entered search criteria (by using elastic search).
    SignInActivity
    This activity is the fist one the user sees.
    SignUpActivity
    This activity allows the user to create a new account with a name, phone number email and username that they can use to access their account again in the future.
    TheirItemActivity
    This class is used to display someone elses entry and the owner information when a borrower selects an item in the list of SearchResultsActivity.
    User
    Created by Martina on 16-02-29.
    UserController
    Created by Martina on 16-03-10.
